twcore.bots.twbot
Class twbotmarco

java.lang.Object
  twcore.bots.TWBotExtension
      twcore.bots.twbot.twbotmarco

public class twbotmarco
extends TWBotExtension

TWBot module that hosts the game Marco Polo. The host adds words to the list and when the host says marco the players need to say a word that is randomly chosen to get their cloak back.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacen Solo

Constructor Detail

twbotmarco

public twbotmarco()
Creates a new instance of the module when it is loaded. and adds polo to wordList.

Method Detail

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(Message event)
Handles a message event, if the person is a ER+ it calls the handleCommand method, if the person is ZH or lower, it calls the handlePublicCommand.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class TWBotExtension
Parameters:
event - event is the Message object.

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(PlayerLeft event)
Remove a person from the deCloaked list if they leave the arena so the last person to say the word will still end up cloakless.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class TWBotExtension
Parameters:
event - event is the PlayerLeft object generated by a person leaving.

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(FrequencyShipChange event)
Remove a person from the deCloaked list if they spec so the last person to say the word will still end up cloakless.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class TWBotExtension
Parameters:
event - event is the FrequencyShipChange object generated by a changing ship or frequency.

handleCommand

public void handleCommand(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String message)
Handles commands from a ER+ to run the Marco Polo game

Parameters:
name - name is the person that sent the command.
message - is the message the person sent so the method can determine what the command is.

handlePublicCommand

public void handlePublicCommand(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String message)
Checks to see if the person said the right word and if they are cloakless. if both are true it gives the person their cloak back.

Parameters:
name - name is the name of the person that sent the message
message - message is the message the person sent.

toggleRunning

public void toggleRunning()
Toggles the mode of Marco Polo, if it is running when the method is called it will turn it off. If it isn't running when the method is called it will turn it on.

displayWords

public void displayWords(java.lang.String name)
pm's the person that sent the !words message with the list of words and the index of the word.

Parameters:
name - name is the name of the person that requested the words.

deleteWord

public void deleteWord(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String message)
Checks to see if wordList has the specified index and deletes the word at that index.

Parameters:
name - name of the person that requested the word deletion.
message - message is the message the person sent.

addWord

public void addWord(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    boolean fromURL)
Adds a word to wordList

Parameters:
name - name of the person that sent the request to add a word.
message - message the person sent.
fromURL - determines if the word was sent from the getWordList method so it gets the right part of the message.

clearWords

public void clearWords(java.lang.String name)
Clears wordList

Parameters:
name - name of the person that requested the wordList.clear()

getWordList

public void getWordList(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String message)
Gets words from a txt file on the internet.

Parameters:
name - name of the person that sent the request to add the list of words.
message - message the person sent.

marco

public void marco()
Takes away everyone's cloaks, adds everyone playing to the deCloaked list, and picks a random word from wordList to be the 'polo' word.
